title: TypeNad
subtitle: Competitive On-Chain Typing Arena
highlights: Built PvP typing game on Monad blockchain with staking mechanics
Real-time 1v1 duels where speed and accuracy determine winners

title: PARAM
subtitle: Blockchain-Based Academic Credential Management System
highlights: ERC-721 NFT credentials on Base Sepolia for tamper-proof academic records
Multi-level approval workflows for semester results & degree certificates
Privy-managed wallets with zero crypto friction for students
Public verification via shareable links with QR codes & blockchain proof

title: HealthBooker
subtitle: Blockchain-Powered Medical Records Management Platform
highlights: AES-256-CBC encrypted medical records with IPFS decentralized storage
Ethereum smart contracts for patient-controlled granular access permissions
SHA-256 blockchain integrity verification with tamper detection
RainbowKit wallet integration for cryptographic record encryption & access control
Full transaction history with on-chain proof of all access and modifications

title: iONIA Platform

OCR-powered handwritten answer assessment with real-time evaluation
Complete admin panel with test, question bank, and user management serving 50+ active students
Selected for CrftHQ Cohort 1 accelerator program

title: GeneTrust AI Studio
subtitle: AI-Powered CRISPR Intelligence Platform
highlights: DNABERT model integration for genetic sequence analysis

Production-ready with TypeScript, JWT auth, and MongoDB Atlas

title: LegalEase

title: ReScroll

title: Mindsera

Groq LLM + Sentence-Transformers generate semantic embeddings for intelligent content analysis
Neo4j Knowledge Graph maps concept relationships with vector search via Qdrant
